T02D2541:221a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'in'a masdag'i ti panydzika sam gra ha n'a ma /

T02D2541:234a-40: dbang du bris kyis tha snyad la dga' ba'i dbang
T02D2541:234a-42: rtog ge pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni ma yin no //
T02D2541:234a-44: so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi mthu drug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2541:234b-0: des na rtog ge ba nga rgyal can rnams @234b la bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D2541:234b-1: 'o na ji lta bu la bstan zhe na /
T02D2541:234b-2: sbyangs pa'i las 'phro yod pa dad pa dang ldan pa /
T02D2541:234b-3: dam tshig srog bzhin du bsrung ba /
T02D2541:234b-4: bla ma dam pa'i bka' la yid ches zhing tshad
T02D2541:234b-5: mar 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan
T02D2541:234b-6: pa rnams la bstan par bya'o //
T02D2541:234b-7: de las gzhan du bstan na log par ltung ba'i gnas su 'gro'o //
T02D2541:234b-8: des na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gsang
T02D2541:234b-9: sngags kyi sgo nas spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis
T02D2541:234b-10: po tir bris la bklag pa'am /
T02D2541:234b-11: tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'am /
T02D2541:234b-12: de kho na nyid la rtse gcig tu bsgoms te /
T02D2541:234b-13: de lta bu'i bye brag dang ldan pa ni yon
T02D2541:234b-14: tan dpag tu med pa thob po zhes bya ba
T02D2541:234b-15: sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bsngags te /
T02D2541:234b-17: dam pa'i chos 'di la mdo sde zhes bya bar yang gdags te /
T02D2541:234b-18: zab mo'i don mdor bsdus nas ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2541:234b-19: rgyud ni 'di nyid la rab tu bsngags te /
T02D2541:234b-20: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2541:234b-21: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02D2541:234b-22: ci'i phyir rgyud ces bya zhe na /
T02D2541:234b-23: bred chags pa'i don gyis na rgyud de ras bal gyi thag pa bzhin no //
T02D2541:234b-24: dkrugs pa'i don gyis na rgyud de thags lta bu'o //
T02D2541:234b-25: yongs su rdzogs pa'i don gyis na rgyud de dpag bsam gyi shing rgyas pa bzhin no //
T02D2541:234b-26: de la breng chags pa'i rgyud ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin pa'i don to //
T02D2541:234b-27: dkrugs pa'i don gyis na thags rgyud ces bya ba
T02D2541:234b-28: ni bla ma dam pa la rag las pa'i don
T02D2541:234b-29: to // yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir na rgyud de bya ba ma lus pa'i don to //
T02D2541:234b-30: des na log pa med par smra bar bya'o //
T02D2541:234b-31: ko taksha la sogs pa'i sgra //
T02D2541:234b-32: 'jig rten bstan bcos la med phyir //
T02D2541:234b-33: rtog can rnams ni rmongs pa skyed //
T02D2541:234b-35: rgyud kyi bdag pos gsungs pa'i bka' //
T02D2541:234b-36: gang zag phal gyi yul min zhing //
T02D2541:234b-37: mkhas pa rnams kyis mang du byas //
T02D2541:234b-38: 'on kyang de don mi rtogs so /
T02D2541:234b-39: mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D2541:234b-40: lung bstan thob nas bsdus pa bris //
T02D2541:234b-41: 'di la brten nas sems can rnams //
T02D2541:234b-42: sku dang ye shes thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam
T02D2541:234b-43: dpal gyi dka' 'grel ratna a'a ka ra guptas mdzad
T02D2541:234b-45: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po k'a la tsa kra dang /
